snippet: Inspired by protests against President Vladimir V. Putin, hundreds of young Muscovites ran for the first time in municipal elections. To the shock of many, dozens won.
abstract: Dozens of Muscovites who had decided to run in municipal elections inspired by the recent protests against Vladimir V Putin have won; surprising results highlight a new passion among educated young Russians to follow their ideals, even if it means taking on the drudgery of local government.
lead_paragraph: Inspired by protests against President Vladimir V. Putin, hundreds of young Muscovites ran for the first time in municipal elections. To the shock of many, dozens won.

headline.seo: Putin Opponents Pick Up Moscow District Council Seats
headline.main: Opposition, to Its Surprise, Wins a Bit of Power in Moscow
headline.print_headline: What? I Won? Opposition Is Surprised by Its Success in Moscow Vote
